newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nichiei, Nichiei Finance trade suspended.
newsitem.headline: Nichiei, Nichiei Finance trade suspended.

text.p: Share trading in Nichiei Co Ltd, a major lumber dealer, and its unit Nichiei Finance Co Ltd has been suspended on the Tokyo Stock Exchange (TSE) for the entire Tuesday session, the TSE said.
The TSE also said trade in Nichiei Co's No.1 uncollateralised convertible bonds has also been suspended.
The exchange said the trade suspension was due to unclear information concerning Nichiei Finance's filing for liquidation.
Nichiei Finance said earlier today that it would file for liquidation with the Yokohama District Court as early as Tuesday, but it did not elaborate.
Nichiei Finance is due to hold a news conference at 9.30 a.m. (0030 GMT), followed by a news conference by Nichiei Co at 9.45 a.m. (0045 GMT).
